TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BuildManager extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a set of methods to help manage the compilation of an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager>類別管理的程序編譯的組件和應用程式的頁面。 它是密封的類別，而且無法被繼承。
<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager> 包含靜態成員，可以提供已編譯的組件的相關資訊。

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddCompilationDependency (string dependency);
.method public static hidebysig void AddCompilationDependency(string dependency) cil managed
Public Shared Sub AddCompilationDependency (dependency As String)
public: static void AddCompilationDependency(System::String ^ dependency);
static member AddCompilationDependency : string -> unit

Docs.param: A string that represents a dependency.
Docs.summary: Specifies a string that represents a dependency that the build manager uses to help determine if a clean build is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須呼叫此方法期間`Application_PreStartInit`階段的應用程式。

Docs.exception: The parameter is or an empty string.
The method was called after the stage of the application.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddReferencedAssembly (System.Reflection.Assembly assembly);
.method public static hidebysig void AddReferencedAssembly(class System.Reflection.Assembly assembly) cil managed
public: static void AddReferencedAssembly(System::Reflection::Assembly ^ assembly);
static member AddReferencedAssembly : System.Reflection.Assembly -> unit

Docs.param: The assembly to add.
Docs.summary: Adds an assembly to the application's set of referenced assemblies.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 呼叫這個方法相當於將組件加入至應用程式層級的 Web.config 檔案。 必須呼叫此方法期間`Application_PreStartInit`階段的應用程式。
<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager.GetReferencedAssemblies%2A>方法會傳回一組由組態檔的組件和任何使用這個方法所加入的組件。
如果嘗試加入已加入的組件，則會忽略重複的項目。
之前，必須呼叫此方法`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案中的事件，就會發生。

Docs.exception: The method was not called before the event in the Global.asax file occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Nullable<bool> BatchCompilationEnabled { get; set; }
.property valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> BatchCompilationEnabled
Public Shared Property BatchCompilationEnabled As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: static property Nullable<bool> BatchCompilationEnabled { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };
member this.BatchCompilationEnabled : Nullable<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether batch compilation is enabled.
Docs.value: 如果永遠啟用批次編譯，如果永遠不會啟用批次編譯，或如果編譯設定的判定方式從組態檔。 預設值是 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此屬性可讓您開啟或關閉的批次編譯以程式設計的方式。 它會對應至`batch`屬性`compilation`Web.config 檔案中的項目。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[compilation 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12)。
這個屬性可以設定只有在`PreApplicationStart`方法。 如需 `PreApplicationStart` 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.PreApplicationStartMethodAttribute>。

Docs.exception: The property was not set in the method.

Public Shared ReadOnly Property CodeAssemblies As IList
public: static property System::Collections::IList ^ CodeAssemblies { System::Collections::IList ^ get(); };
member this.CodeAssemblies : System.Collections.IList

Docs.summary: Gets a list of assemblies built from the App_Code directory.
Docs.value: 集合，其中包含從 App_Code 目錄所建立的組件。

.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Stream CreateCachedFile(string fileName) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateCachedFile (fileName As String) As Stream
public: static System::IO::Stream ^ CreateCachedFile(System::String ^ fileName);
static member CreateCachedFile : string -> System.IO.Stream

Docs.param: The name of the file to create.
Docs.summary: Creates a cached file.
Docs.returns: The object for the new file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法和<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager.ReadCachedFile%2A>方法可讓您執行快取保存跨網域重新啟動應用程式在部分信任環境中。 它會使用 MVC 架構控制器查閱快取結果。
快取資料，您將寫入<xref:System.IO.Stream>這個方法所傳回的物件。

Public Shared Function CreateInstanceFromVirtualPath (virtualPath As String, requiredBaseType As Type) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ CreateInstanceFromVirtualPath(System::String ^ virtualPath, Type ^ requiredBaseType);
static member CreateInstanceFromVirtualPath : string * Type -> obj

Docs.param: The virtual path of the file to create an instance of.
The base type that defines the object to be created.
Docs.summary: Processes a file, given its virtual path, and creates an instance of the result.
Docs.returns: The that represents the instance of the processed file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager.CreateInstanceFromVirtualPath%2A>方法適用於編譯和非編譯網頁。

Docs.summary: Returns a build dependency set from the ASP.NET cache.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.Compilation.BuildDependencySet GetCachedBuildDependencySet (System.Web.HttpContext context, string virtualPath);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.Compilation.BuildDependencySet GetCachedBuildDependencySet(class System.Web.HttpContext context, string virtualPath) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCachedBuildDependencySet (context As HttpContext, virtualPath As String) As BuildDependencySet
public: static System::Web::Compilation::BuildDependencySet ^ GetCachedBuildDependencySet(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context, System::String ^ virtualPath);
static member GetCachedBuildDependencySet : System.Web.HttpContext * string -> System.Web.Compilation.BuildDependencySet

Docs.param: The context of the request.
The virtual path from which to determine the build dependency set.
Docs.summary: Returns a build dependency set for a virtual path if the path is located in the ASP.NET cache.
Docs.returns: A object that is stored in the cache, or if the object cannot be retrieved from the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.Compilation.BuildDependencySet GetCachedBuildDependencySet (System.Web.HttpContext context, string virtualPath, bool ensureIsUpToDate);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.Compilation.BuildDependencySet GetCachedBuildDependencySet(class System.Web.HttpContext context, string virtualPath, bool ensureIsUpToDate) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCachedBuildDependencySet (context As HttpContext, virtualPath As String, ensureIsUpToDate As Boolean) As BuildDependencySet
public: static System::Web::Compilation::BuildDependencySet ^ GetCachedBuildDependencySet(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context, System::String ^ virtualPath, bool ensureIsUpToDate);
static member GetCachedBuildDependencySet : System.Web.HttpContext * string * bool -> System.Web.Compilation.BuildDependencySet

Docs.param: The context of the request.
The virtual path from which to determine the build dependency set.
to specify that only a current build dependency set should be returned, or to indicate that any available build dependency set should be returned, even if it is not current. The default is .
Docs.summary: Returns a build dependency set for a virtual path if the path is located in the ASP.NET cache, even if the content is not current.
Docs.returns: A object that is stored in the cache, or if the object cannot be retrieved from the cache.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果`ensureIsUpToDate`參數值設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager.GetCachedBuildDependencySet%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載的行為類似<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager.GetCachedBuildDependencySet%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載。 這兩個多載會傳回目前的組建相依性，如果有的話，請設定，否則它們會傳回`null`。
不過，<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager.GetCachedBuildDependencySet%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載包含選項，以傳回任何建置相依性集合，可使用，即使過期的一個。 如果`ensureIsUpToDate`參數值設定為`false`，則方法會傳回任何可用的組建相依性集合。

Docs.summary: Gets an object that represents the compiled type for the Global.asax file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已編譯的 Global.asax 檔案之前，會呼叫這個方法，則會擲回例外狀況。

Docs.exception: An attempt was made to call this method before the Global.asax page was compiled.

Docs.param: The virtual path.
to throw an error if the virtual path does not exist; otherwise, . If the virtual path does not exist and throwIfNotFound is , this method returns .
Docs.summary: Gets an object factory for the specified virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回物件，可讓您藉由編譯的虛擬路徑產生的類型。 它會傳回物件，不論是否已先行編譯網站。

Docs.exception: The virtual path does not exist. -or- A higher-level exception already existed when this method was called. -or- This method was called while the compilation process was building top-level files. -or- This is a precompiled application and the virtual path was not found in the cache. -or- A circular reference was detected.

Docs.summary: Returns a list of assembly references that all page compilations must reference.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 從傳回的組件集合<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager.GetReferencedAssemblies%2A>方法包含在其他最上層資料夾中的 Web.config 檔案的項目中指定組件、 從自訂程式碼在 App_Code 目錄中，所建立的組件和組件。
<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager.GetReferencedAssemblies%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET Framework 版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

Docs.summary: Finds a type in the top-level assemblies or in assemblies that are defined in configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最上層組件參考 Global.asax 檔案中，或 App_GlobalResources、 App_WebReferences、 App_Code 或 App_Browsers 目錄中的檔案。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法和<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager.CreateCachedFile%2A>方法可讓您執行快取保存跨網域重新啟動應用程式在部分信任環境中。 它會使用 MVC 架構控制器查閱快取結果。
若要擷取快取的資料，您讀取<xref:System.IO.Stream>這個方法所傳回的物件。

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName TargetFramework { get; }
.property class System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName TargetFramework
Public Shared ReadOnly Property TargetFramework As FrameworkName
public: static property System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ TargetFramework { System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ get(); };
member this.TargetFramework : System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName

Docs.summary: Gets the target version of the .NET Framework for the current Web site.
Docs.value: 目前的 Web 站台的.NET framework 目標版本。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性支援 ASP.NET 多目標功能，可讓您使用最新版本的 Visual Studio 來開發應用程式在其中執行具有較早版本的.NET Framework。 組建提供者可以使用這個屬性，並確定在提供者產生程式碼適用於.NET Framework 目標版本。 例如，您可以產生不同的程式碼取決於是否網站目標[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。 如需多目標功能的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 專案的.NET Framework 多目標](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b8145a9-62f6-4fc4-8a83-47b0487cbe76)。 如果網站沒有 Web.config 檔，ASP.NET 會假設目標 framework 版本為 IIS 應用程式集區下執行的站台相關聯的版本。 檔案系統網站上執行 Visual Studio 中，預設的 framework 版本是最新版.NET Framework。 如果網站沒有 Web.config 檔，ASP.NET 會檢查 Web.config 檔案來判斷目標架構。 ## .NET Framework 2.0 為目標的 Web Sites Web 應用程式目標[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]好像目標編譯[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]。 在建置程序不會區分[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]因為其中一個版本為目標時，Web.config 檔案並不表示編譯器版本或目標 framework。 (如[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]，Web.config 檔案指定的編譯器版本，以及[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，Web.config 檔案中指定的目標 framework。)因此，針對 Web 應用程式目標[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，這個屬性會傳回指出目標 framework moniker [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]。 這通常不會造成任何問題。 Visual Studio 會讓您建立參考[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]設為目標的專案中的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。 例如，Visual Studio 不提供項目範本設為目標的專案中的 WCF 服務[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，因為 WCF 引進[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和不相容[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。 如果您打算將網站部署[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]執行階段環境，而且您使用參考功能只與相容的 Visual Studio 以外工具[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]，而不會產生錯誤或警告可能會建置專案。 不過，應用程式可能會產生錯誤的網站上執行時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。
